pkgmetadata.longdescription: Collaborative Graphical Lasso - Multi-Omics Network Reconstruction // Reconstruct networks from multi-omics data sets with the collaborative graphical lasso (coglasso) algorithm described in Albanese, A., Kohlen, W., and Behrouzi, P. (2024) arXiv:2403.18602. Build multiple networks using the coglasso() function, select the best one with stars_coglasso().
